metadata.description:
6 CHAPTER DIGITAL EXCLUSIVE SERIES! 

The comic you can't wait to read to go along with the game you can't wait to play! The TRANSFORMERS: FALL OF CYBERTRON digital comic leads directly into the upcoming video game. Let Transformers: Robots in Disguise writer JOHN BARBER and hot new artist DHEERAJ VERMA introduce you to the world of Cybertron as we meet GRIMLOCK, SNARL, SLUG, SLUDGE, and SWOOP—the team that someday will be called—the DINOBOTS!
metadata.name: Transformers: Fall of Cybertron
